title.narrative: Programme Management- Ghana Oil and Gas for Inclusive Growth

description.narrative: This activity (Programme Management- Ghana Oil and Gas for Inclusive Growth) is a component of Ghana Oil and Gas for Inclusive Growth reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £14,689,762. This component benefits Ghana, and works in the following sector(s): Public sector policy and administrative management, Domestic revenue mobilisation, Energy policy and administrative management. , with the following implementing partners: Oxford Policy Management. The start date is 01-09-2014 and the end date is 30-06-2020.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

sector.narrative: Public sector policy and administrative management

description.narrative: Executive - General Public Service - Executive - executive
